mapper.select: select * from meeting order by meet_date and meet_start desc limit 8;
select meet_num,meet_subject,meet_interest,meet_region,meet_start,meet_end,meet_thum from meeting where meet_adState = 1 order by meet_date and meet_start desc limit 5

select m.meet_num,m.meet_subject,m.meet_interest,m.meet_region,m.meet_start,m.meet_end,m.meet_thum from meeting m where m.meet_region = (select mb.mem_region from members mb where mb.mem_id = #{param1}) and m.meet_adState = 1 order by meet_date and meet_start desc limit 5
